data.name: MessageBox_CantUndone
data.value: この操作は元に戻せません。

data.name: Mod_BackwardCompatibilityMessage
data.value: オリジナルのNode Controller2から、各設定をRenewal用に変換しました。 一部の設定には互換性が無く、手動で調整する必要があります。

data.name: Mod_BackwardCompatibilityWarning
data.value: 警告: マップをセーブして次回のロードから、オリジナルのNode Controller2は設定が認識できません。

data.name: Mod_Description
data.value: 交差点やノードの種類・形状を、調整や変更ができます。

data.name: Mod_LoadFailed
data.value: ロード中にエラーが発生しました。 {0} ヶ所のノードでロードに失敗しました。

data.name: Mod_LoadFailedAll
data.value: ロード中にエラーが発生しました。 全てのノードでロードに失敗しました。

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0
data.value: [RELEASE] Renewal version release

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3
data.value: [UPDATED] Added the ability to disable option "fix stuck pedestrian on long intersections" due to complaining about affecting simulation speed. The option is disabled by default, can be enabled in the mod settings. [NEW] Added option "Collision". if you disable it for segment, segment will not have limits for changing offset and can be overlapped by other segments. [NEW] Added option "Nodeless". it makes segment render without node. [NEW] Added the ability to hide unused options. All options exclude offset, shift and rotate can be hidden in the mod settings if you dont use them. [FIXED] Fixed shift calculation on middle nodes. [UPDATED] Max slope value for roads was increased to 60 degrees. [UPDATED] Max tweest value for roads was increased to 60 degrees. [UPDATED] Max shift value was increased to 64 meters. [FIXED] Fixed hole in overlay on such a big nodes. [TRANSLATION] Added Romanian language.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Added Plazas & Promenades DLC support. [FIXED] Fixed prop positions on twisted segments. [FIXED] Simulation data is not changed from main thread anymore. [FIXED] Fixed missing crosswalk texture on crosswalk nodes.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3_2
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed terrain glitches that could appear when using Surface Painter mod. [TRANSLATION] Added Czech language.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3_3
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed compatibility with Adaptive Network mod which could cause blue voids instead of nodes. [FIXED] Fixed error when missed network asset could cause NCR data loading failure.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_4
data.value: [NEW] Added free-form mode that allow to set corner position and rotation without any limitations. [NEW] Added the ability to disable "Follow main slope" for segments that allows to make segments slope independently. [NEW] Added the ability to set delta height for each segment. [UPDATED] Bend nodes follow slope of near nodes, so that segment between them is smoother. [FIXED] Default offset of railways is not set to 0.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_5
data.value: [UPDATED] New UI style. [NEW] Allow to change offset and rotation for nodeless segments. [NEW] Allow to move end node in free form mode. [NEW] Added shift to free form mode. [NEW] Added flat end to free form mode. [NEW] Allow to change value with step 0.01 by scrolling the wheel when Alt is being held. [NEW] Hold ctrl to move only by X direction, hold alt to move only by Y direction in free form mode. [NEW] Added option to set overlay opacity. [NEW] Segment overlay color is blinking when its fields on panel is being hovered. [FIXED] Fixed nodeless segment position in free form mode. [FIXED] Fixed default value of corner direction in free form mode. [FIXED] Fixed error while editing nodes which is connected to transport strations or buildings.
